title: NiNoKuni
short_cast: Kento Yamazaki, Mackenyu, Mei Nagano, Mamoru Miyano, Maaya Sakamoto, Yuki Kaji, Kenjiro Tsuda, Koichi Yamadera, Masatoh Ibu, Tsuyoshi Muro
cast: Kento Yamazaki, Mackenyu, Mei Nagano, Mamoru Miyano, Maaya Sakamoto, Yuki Kaji, Kenjiro Tsuda, Koichi Yamadera, Masatoh Ibu, Tsuyoshi Muro
genre: Japanese, Family Features, Anime based on a Video Game, Sci-Fi & Fantasy Anime, Anime Features, Action & Adventure

desc: Two average teens go on a magical quest to save the life of their friend and her counterpart from another world. But love complicates their journey.
